Class DrawingTool

java.lang.Object
  DrawingTool

public class DrawingTool
extends java.lang.Object

Enables the user to draw on a canvas by typing commands. Sorts the commands received and calls the appropriate mutator methods from the DrawAssist class

Version:
(02/12/2016)
Author:
Edward Taylor (based on original code by David J. Barnes)

Constructor Summary
DrawingTool()
          Prepare to draw on a canvas of default size.
DrawingTool(int width, int height)
          Prepare to draw on a canvas of specified size.
 
Method Summary
 void draw()
          Initiates the drawing command interface and uses user input to effect drawing mechanics via sorting methods and DrawAssist
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
